gui.widget.earth
Interface TemperatureGrid

public interface TemperatureGrid

Implement this interface to allow for the retrieval of information pertaining to a grid of temperatures. The top left corner of the grid is considered to have the coordinates (0, 0); the bottom right corner will have coordinates (x, y) in an x by y grid with x columns and y rows.

Author:
Andrew Bernard

Method Summary
 float getCellHeight(int x, int y)
          Gets the height of the cell at the specified coordinates
 double getTemperature(int x, int y)
          Gets the temperature in the cell specified by the x and y coordinates.
